## alpacon csr create

Create a CSR

### Synopsis


 	Generates a new Certificate Signing Request based on provided information, 
	which can then be submitted for signing to a certificate authority.
	

```
alpacon csr create [flags]
```

### Examples

```
alpacon csr create
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for create
```
